sqlMap.insert: insert into CROWDFUNDING(funding_Num, funding_Target_Amount, funding_Present_Amount, funding_Start_Date, funding_End_Date, state_Code) values(funding_seq.nextval, #fundingTargetAmount#, 0, #fundingStartDate#,#fundingEndDate#,'F003')
sqlMap.select: select count(funding_num) from CROWDFUNDING where state_code = 'F001'
select count(funding_num) from CROWDFUNDING where state_code = 'F002'
select count(funding_num) from CROWDFUNDING where state_code = 'F005'
sqlMap.update: update crowdfunding set FUNDING_PRESENT_AMOUNT= funding_present_amount+(#investPoint# *100) where funding_num=(select funding_num from content where content_num=#contentNum#)
update crowdfunding set state_code='F001' where funding_present_amount>=funding_target_amount and (to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')-to_char(funding_end_date,'yyyymmdd'))>0
update crowdfunding set state_code='F002' where funding_present_amount<funding_target_amount and (to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')-to_char(funding_end_date,'yyyymmdd'))>0
sqlMap.select: select funding_target_amount,funding_present_amount,funding_end_date, content_img,content_title,content_content from crowdfunding cf , content c where to_date(sysdate,'yy/MM/dd')>to_date(cf.funding_end_date,'yy/MM/dd')
